title: i just bought $10 of Rp and then bought MF now im 20 rp short
body:
Hello.  So as the title says im 20 rp short.  Im not good at making drawings or anything, but if i need to exchange something for 20 rp im white as hell but ill freestyle for you XD.

Anyway heard that this is something that is a possibility.  I have never asked before.

replies.body: This is something we might be able to help you out with!  Please reach out to player support by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), or reaching out to them on Twitter with @RiotSupport.  Looking forward to some freestyle!  xD
What's funny about that is during the shop i was 15 rp off from chosen yi and you guys said you couldn't give me it as it was out of your guys's power :D
Who did you talk to, and had you already asked for RP before? They'll only do it once.
The support , I made a ticket and they said it wasn't in their power to give me rp.
i submitted a ticket its #22513077 if you are interested @Porocles
